flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
手足の　カギヅメを　突き立てて　木を　登る。
親の　いない　すきを　ねらって　木の　上に
ある　巣　から　タマゴを　盗んで　食べる。

Sneasel scales trees by punching its hooked claws into the
bark. This Pokémon seeks out unguarded nests and steals
eggs for food while the parents are away.

Sneasel si arrampica sugli alberi conficcando i suoi artigli
uncinati nella corteccia. È sempre alla ricerca di nidi incustoditi
per rubare le uova e cibarsene mentre i genitori sono assenti.

Sneasel trepa por los árboles agarrándose a la corteza con las
garras curvas que tiene. Este Pokémon busca nidos
desprovistos de vigilancia paterna para robar los huevos y
comérselos.

Sniebel klettert an Bäumen hoch, indem es seine
hakenförmigen Krallen in die Rinde schlägt. Dieses
Pokémon sucht nach unbewachten Nestern und
stiehlt die Eier. Davon ernährt es sich.

Farfuret grimpe aux arbres en enfonçant ses griffes crochues
dans l’écorce. Ce Pokémon cherche les nids qui ne sont pas
surveillés et vole les œufs pour les manger pendant que
les parents sont partis.

손발의 갈고리 손발톱을 꽂아 나무를 오른다.
부모가 없는 틈을 노려 나무 위에
있는 둥지에서 알을 훔쳐 먹는다.

てあしの　カギヅメを　つきたてて　きを　のぼる。
おやの　いない　すきを　ねらって　きの　うえに
ある　す　から　タマゴを　ぬすんで　たべる。

手足の　カギヅメを　突き立てて　木を　登る。
親の　いない　すきを　ねらって　木の　上に
ある　巣　から　タマゴを　盗んで　食べる。

bark. This Pokémon seeks out unguarded nests and steals
eggs for food while the parents are away.

Sneasel si arrampica sugli alberi conficcando i suoi artigli
uncinati nella corteccia. È sempre alla ricerca di nidi incustoditi
per rubare le uova e cibarsene mentre i genitori sono assenti.

Sneasel trepa por los árboles agarrándose a la corteza con las
garras curvas que tiene. Este Pokémon busca nidos
desprovistos de vigilancia paterna para robar los huevos y
comérselos.

Sniebel klettert an Bäumen hoch, indem es seine
hakenförmigen Krallen in die Rinde schlägt. Dieses
Pokémon sucht nach unbewachten Nestern und
stiehlt die Eier. Davon ernährt es sich.

Farfuret grimpe aux arbres en enfonçant ses griffes crochues
dans l’écorce. Ce Pokémon cherche les nids qui ne sont pas
surveillés et vole les œufs pour les manger pendant que
les parents sont partis.

손발의 갈고리 손발톱을 꽂아 나무를 오른다.
부모가 없는 틈을 노려 나무 위에
있는 둥지에서 알을 훔쳐 먹는다.

てあしの　カギヅメを　つきたてて　きを　のぼる。
おやの　いない　すきを　ねらって　きの　うえに
ある　す　から　タマゴを　ぬすんで　たべる。

鋭いツメを　指の　中に
隠している。いきなり　伸ばして
襲ってきた　相手を　ひるませる。

Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked,
it suddenly extends the claws and startles
its enemy.

Le zampe nascondono artigli affilati. Se è attaccato,
allunga gli artigli spaventando i nemici.

Sus ocultas garras son muy afiladas. Si le atacan,
extiende sus garras y asusta al enemigo.

In seinen Pfoten stecken scharfe Krallen. Es fährt sie
blitzschnell aus, um die Gegner zu überraschen.

Ses griffes sont cachées dans ses pattes. S’il est
attaqué, il les sort pour frapper ses ennemis.

예리한 손톱을 손가락 안에
감추고 있다. 갑자기 뻗어서
습격해온 상대를 풀죽게 만든다.

するどいツメを　ゆびの　なかに
かくしている。いきなり　のばして
おそってきた　あいてを　ひるませる。

住処から　タマゴを　かすめ取り
食べてしまう。鋭い　カギヅメが
相手の　急所を　切り裂く。

It feeds on eggs stolen from nests. Its sharply
hooked claws rip vulnerable spots on prey.

Mangia uova rubate dai nidi. Attacca i nemici nei
punti deboli con i suoi artigli uncinati.

Se alimenta de huevos robados en nidos. Clava sus
afiladas garras en los puntos débiles de sus rivales.

Es ernährt sich von Eiern, die es aus Nestern stiehlt.
Beute greift es mit seinen scharfen Krallen an.

Il se nourrit d’œufs volés dans des nids. Ses griffes
crochues percent les défenses de l’ennemi.

거처에서 알을 가로채어 먹어
버린다. 날카로운 갈고리 손톱이
상대의 급소를 베어 가른다.

すみかから　タマゴを　かすめとり
たべてしまう。するどい　カギヅメが
あいての　きゅうしょを　きりさく。

A smart and sneaky Pokémon,
it makes its opponents flinch by suddenly
showing the claws hidden in its paws.

A smart and sneaky Pokémon,
it makes its opponents flinch by suddenly
showing the claws hidden in its paws.

A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair
may work together to steal eggs by
having one lure the parents away.

Ce Pokémon rusé agit parfois en
équipe pour voler des œufs, l’un
d’entre eux faisant diversion.

A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair
may work together to steal eggs by
having one lure the parents away.

Ce Pokémon rusé agit parfois en
équipe pour voler des œufs, l’un
d’entre eux faisant diversion.

Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY
from their nests and scavenges any
leftovers it can find.

Its paws conceal sharp claws. If
attacked, it suddenly extends the
claws and startles its enemy.

A smart and sneaky Pokémon. A pair
may work together to steal eggs by
having one lure the parents away.

It is extremely vicious and will not
stop attacking until its foe is
incapable of moving.

It feeds on eggs stolen from
nests. Its sharply hooked claws
rip vulnerable spots on prey.

Its paws conceal sharp claws.
If attacked, it suddenly extends the
claws and startles its enemy.

Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from
their nests and feasts on the eggs that
are left behind.

A SNEASEL scales trees by punching its
hooked claws into the bark. It seeks out
unguarded nests and steals eggs for food
while the parents are away.

hooked claws into the bark.
This POKéMON seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while
the parents are away.

This POKéMON seeks out unguarded nests and steals eggs for food while
the parents are away.

This cunning
POKéMON hides
under the cover of darkness,
waiting to attack
its prey.

Vicious in nature,
it drives PIDGEY
from their nests and feasts on the

behind.

sharp claws. If
